publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-6913.1 Hugh O’Donnell: Israeli and Palestinian Peace Talks—As an amendment to motion (S3M-6913) in the name of Stewart Maxwell, insert at end "; and for them to include discussions to lift the siege on Gaza." Motions and amendments which have attracted additional support

S3M-6913.1 Hugh O’Donnell: Israeli and Palestinian Peace Talks—As an amendment to motion (S3M-6913) in the name of Stewart Maxwell, insert at end "; and for them to include discussions to lift the siege on Gaza."
